name: VectorSoldier V.RO
description:
In the distant Cyber-Year 30XX, sentient AI programs have been created to protect the world of Cyber-Space, a vast, unending dimension humanity had created and eventually migrated to following the heat-death of Universe 2. One of these AI programs are dubbed V.RO. 

With the presence of the anti-virus programs, Cyber-Space seemed like a safe place to exist in peace. That was... until the appearance of rogue programs in various sectors, corrupting and changing their surroundings. It's up to V.RO to take down these malicious programs and find what's causing them!

Default Controls:
ArrowKeys: Move
Z: Shoot / Confirm
X: Jump / Cancel
C: Fire Subweapon
RShift: Cycle Subweapons
Enter: Pause

Eco - Sprites
Clayzulah - Music
RainbowCemetery - Code
